title: T206 rebel oakes psa 6 epdg back!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: T206 rebel oakes psa 6 epdg back!
posts.post_content: According to current psa population, only 2 psa 7's and 1 psa 8 of all backs! Factor now a rare back and you have an  extremely rare card. Scans available, price $595 or consider trade for high grade t206. There is a Sgc 84 with a common back currently on ebay for $3500 by a reputable dealer!! Thanks-kevin  PRICE REDUCED TO $499!
Bump. Price reduction to $499. This is one incredible card!
Bump. First $499 gets it, check out post in net 54 archives about how rare epdg backs are!
